name: bj-ax12v3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))

stmt.origin: syl5(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wal(s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))

|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: A weak version of ~ ax-12 which is stronger than ~ ax12v . Note that if one assumes reflexivity of equality ` |- x = x ` ( ~ equid ), then ~ bj-ax12v3 implies ~ ax-5 over modal logic K (substitute ` x ` for ` y ` ). See also ~ bj-ax12v3ALT . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jul-2021.)
